errors.name: InvalidVestingSchedule
errors.msg: Vesting duration must be greater than release frequency

errors.name: VestingCompleted
errors.msg: All vesting intervals have been completed

errors.name: InsufficientVestingBalance
errors.msg: Not enough tokens in vesting account

errors.name: TokensNotYetAvailable
errors.msg: Tokens exist but are not available for sale yet - wait for next interval

errors.name: NoTokensVested
errors.msg: Vesting account has no tokens yet

errors.name: BondingCurveCompleted
errors.msg: Bonding curve has been completed and migrated to Raydium

errors.name: InsufficientVestedTokens
errors.msg: Not enough tokens available in the current vesting interval

errors.name: InvalidTimestamp
errors.msg: Invalid timestamp detected. Possible manipulation attempt.

errors.name: TestInstructionNotAvailable
errors.msg: Test instruction not available in production build

fields.name: max_sol_cost
docs: Maximum SOL cost in lamports for the initial token purchase

types.name: OperationPausedEvent
docs: Event emitted when an operation is paused

fields.name: operation_type
docs: The type of operation that was paused

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when the operation was paused

types.name: OperationResumedEvent
docs: Event emitted when an operation is resumed

fields.name: operation_type
docs: The type of operation that was resumed

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when the operation was resumed

types.name: PauseFlags
docs: Flags indicating which operations are currently paused

fields.name: create_paused
docs: Whether token creation is paused

fields.name: sell_paused
docs: Whether token selling is paused

fields.name: withdraw_token_paused
docs: Whether token withdrawals are paused

fields.name: withdraw_sol_paused
docs: Whether SOL withdrawals are paused

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved flags for future operations

types.name: PauseState
docs: The pause state account that controls which operations are paused

fields.name: pause_authority
docs: Authority that can pause/resume operations

fields.name: flags
docs: Flags for different operation states

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future use

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation

fields.name: pause_authority
docs: Authority that can pause/resume operations

fields.name: flags
docs: Flags for different operation states

fields.name: reserved
docs: Reserved space for future use

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation

fields.name: create_fee
docs: Fee for creating a new vested token (0.1 SOL)

fields.name: sell_fee
docs: Fee for selling vested tokens (0.01 SOL)

fields.name: min_investment
docs: Minimum SOL creator must invest initially (0.2 SOL)

fields.name: max_investment
docs: Maximum SOL creator can invest initially (0.5 SOL)

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's public key

fields.name: mint
docs: The token's mint address

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of SOL withdrawn

fields.name: remaining_balance
docs: Remaining SOL balance in the vesting account

fields.name: min_required_balance
docs: Minimum required balance for remaining operations

fields.name: remaining_intervals
docs: Number of remaining vesting intervals

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the withdrawal

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's public key

fields.name: mint
docs: The token's mint address

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of tokens withdrawn

fields.name: intervals_completed
docs: Number of completed intervals after this withdrawal

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the withdrawal

fields.name: is_final_interval
docs: Whether this was the final interval

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's public key

fields.name: mint
docs: The token's mint address

fields.name: initial_amount
docs: Initial amount of tokens placed in vesting

fields.name: total_intervals
docs: Total number of vesting intervals

fields.name: total_duration
docs: Total vesting duration in seconds

fields.name: release_frequency
docs: Release frequency in seconds

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Creation timestamp

fields.name: initial_investment
docs: Initial SOL investment amount

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's public key

fields.name: mint
docs: The token's mint address

fields.name: token_amount
docs: Amount of tokens sold

fields.name: sol_received
docs: Amount of SOL received

fields.name: intervals_completed
docs: Number of completed intervals after this sale

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the sale

fields.name: min_sol_return
docs: Minimum SOL return that was guaranteed

fields.name: is_final_interval
docs: Whether this was the final interval

types.name: VestingAccount
docs: The vesting account that holds tokens for the creator

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's public key (who created the token)

fields.name: mint
docs: The mint of the token being vested

fields.name: token_account
docs: The associated token account holding the vested tokens

fields.name: total_duration
docs: Total vesting duration in seconds (minimum 36 hours)

fields.name: release_frequency
docs: Minimum time that must pass between releases in seconds (minimum 4 hours)

fields.name: initial_sol_lamports
docs: Initial SOL amount in lamports invested to create the token (max_sol_cost)

fields.name: initial_token_amount
docs: Initial amount of tokens placed in vesting

fields.name: intervals_completed
docs: Number of completed sell intervals

fields.name: total_intervals
docs: Total number of intervals (derived from duration/frequency)

fields.name: creation_timestamp
docs: Timestamp when the vesting account was created

fields.name: last_sell_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the last sell (0 if no sells yet)

fields.name: last_withdraw_sol_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the last SOL withdrawal (0 if no withdrawals yet)

fields.name: last_withdraw_token_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of the last token withdrawal (0 if no withdrawals yet)

fields.name: completion_virtual_token_reserves
docs: Virtual token reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_virtual_sol_reserves
docs: Virtual SOL reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_real_token_reserves
docs: Real token reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_real_sol_reserves
docs: Real SOL reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_token_total_supply
docs: Token total supply at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_bonding_complete
docs: Whether the bonding curve was complete at vesting completion

fields.name: last_instruction_slot
docs: The slot of the last instruction executed on this account

fields.name: bump
docs: Reserved for future use

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's public key

fields.name: mint
docs: The token's mint address

fields.name: total_intervals
docs: Total number of intervals completed

fields.name: total_duration
docs: Total duration in seconds

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp of completion

fields.name: virtual_token_reserves
docs: Virtual token reserves at completion

fields.name: virtual_sol_reserves
docs: Virtual SOL reserves at completion

fields.name: real_token_reserves
docs: Real token reserves at completion

fields.name: real_sol_reserves
docs: Real SOL reserves at completion

fields.name: token_total_supply
docs: Token total supply at completion

fields.name: bonding_curve_complete
docs: Whether the bonding curve was complete

fields.name: initial_sol_lamports
docs: Initial SOL amount in lamports invested to create the token (max_sol_cost)

fields.name: is_bonding_complete
docs: Whether the bonding curve is complete and tokens should be withdrawn instead of sold

fields.name: creation_timestamp
docs: Timestamp when the vesting account was created

fields.name: completion_virtual_token_reserves
docs: Virtual token reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_virtual_sol_reserves
docs: Virtual SOL reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_real_token_reserves
docs: Real token reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_real_sol_reserves
docs: Real SOL reserves at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_token_total_supply
docs: Token total supply at vesting completion (0 if not completed)

fields.name: completion_bonding_complete
docs: Whether the bonding curve was complete at vesting completion

fields.name: last_instruction_slot
docs: The slot of the last instruction executed on this account
